features: Summer's Eve Lavender Night-time Daily Refreshing Feminine Wash removes odor-causing bacteria
During your shower enjoy an intimate care and feminine body wash that’s a refreshing, cleansing experience for under your arms, breasts, and even in your intimate area, so you can take on anything
Lavender Night-time indulgent SafeScent is inspired by soothing lavender and sheer amber and gentle enough for your most delicate skin
Summer’s Eve daily refreshing intimate wash is gynecologist tested, free from dyes and parabens, and the product is not tested on animals
Uniquely formulated and pH balanced to match the intimate area’s natural chemistry
Contains 3 bottles of Summer's Eve Lavender Night-time feminine wash 12 fl oz each
body.description: A refreshing, cleansing experience for your intimate area so you can take on anything. Summer's Eve Refreshing feminine care products comes in a variety of indulgent SafeScents letting you experience that unique, everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve Feminine Body Wash is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products, along with every unique scent, are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Summer's Eve Lavender Night-time Daily Refreshing Feminine Wash removes odor-causing bacteria down there. That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-Refreshing or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 SafeScents 2 Odor-Causing Bacteria 3 Gynecologist Tested 4 pH-Balanced 5 Free From Dyes & Parabens

Summer's Eve Refresh Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents Neutralizes Odor pH-balanced Gently Cleanses Absorbs Moisture Free from Parabens Tested SafeScents

What do you mean by "Safe Scents"? We want to provide you with safe, best smelling products for your intimate care routine. All of our scented cosmetic products are clinically tested by gynecologists to ensure that they are safe, even for those of us with sensitive skin. What's the Refresh Collection? Our Refresh Collection is for those who love to bask in luscious fragrances. It has has an extensive range of fragrance levels, from a light, barely-there fragrance or a bold fragrance that gives you a long-lasting boost of freshness Why does pH matter? It's important to your body’s natural defense and maintaining a good environment for a healthy external vaginal area. The pH of ordinary soap, can be very basic (high pH) and may not complement the natural pH range of your external vaginal area. Isn’t Summer’s Eve and Fem Care just if you have a problem? I don’t have an issue “down there” … The external vaginal area is different than other parts of your body – its delicate, and has a different pH than other areas of the body – and so it needs a different kind of care. What can I do if I experience vaginal itching? If you are experiencing vaginal itching, we recommend you talk with your doctor or healthcare professional about your symptoms. If you know that you have a yeast infection, you can find relief with one of our Monistat products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for your daily showering routine
reviews.reviewText: This product right here I've been using for YEARS! It has a very refreshing scent of Lavender that makes you feel clean. Gives you an all day fresh feeling. As it lathers very well you won't need to use much more than a nickel size portion at every shower. Great to use anytime before & after work days, when doing any physical activities that need some Lavender fresh clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent and how gentle this wash is, I also use it for all over the body because I just love the scent. Very gentle on the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I brought the product because their were no more in the store. But being in a rush I didn't check if it was for sensitive skin that was my fault other than that they work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great. Just what I wanted. It lathers well also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and calming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells so good, and moisturizes…wish they made perfume scented exactly like this! Smells so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY Poor Packaging
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is fantastic. I’ve been using it for years with no issue. I’ve had to start buying it online because my local stores no longer carry it. Problem is, both times I’ve bought it on amazon so far, the bottles leaked significantly and mucked up any other purchases in the box as well. This time, two of the three bottles were opened and half of the product spilled everywhere. If you can avoid it, don’t buy these online.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used to take stock in it, but since they’ve changed the label, they must’ve changed the ingredients I cannot purchase due to a reaction.
